name: hm07
effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Waterfall)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.platinum: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
